articles.title: Shockingly strong solar storm sparks powerful aurora at BOTH ends of Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: On Wednesday, CME particles struck the Earth causing an intense solar storm. The event was so powerful that it resulted in a powerful aurora display in both the polar regions.
articles.content: The solar storm that struck the Earth on March 15 after a powerful wave of coronal mass ejection (CME) escaped from the surface of the Sun, continues to haunt our planet. Surprisingly, the explosion … [+1823 chars]
